{"name": "CarePointe Community Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Client need to look for care pointe - In the property there is an entrance door with blue awning on it.

Clients are required to enter and check in and a valid photo ID and proof of address are required to register and be served at CarePointe.

CarePointe Food Pantry is open to customers on Wednesdays and Saturdays from 9:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. m. to 12:30 p.m. m. 

Visit https://crosspointechurch.com/carepointe/ for complete details, directions, holiday closures, and a list of items you can donate.

Call (678) 802-7233 to confirm holiday and inclement weather closures.

Gwinnett County residents only", "email": "", "url": "https://crosspointechurch.com/carepointe/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1800 Satellite Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Duluth", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30097", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.9937614, "longitude": -84.08404039999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 802-7222", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
